description.value:
1. New Horizons (200xp): Gain Common Lore (Koronus Expanse) and either Scholastic Lore (Astromancy) or Trade (Explorator) as trained Skills.
2. The Thrill of War (250xp): +3 Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill, -3 Fellowship. Gain Scholastic Lore (Tactical Imperialis) as Trained Skill. Gain Nerves of Steel and Quick Draw Talents.
3. No Joy Unexplored (200xp): +3 Toughness or +3 Fellowship, -3 Willpower. Gain Decadence and Carouse Trained Skill. Gain 1d5 Corruption Points.
